sentences.en: "Oh, that, " said the old man, opening the drawer in the kitchen table, and taking out a tiny, rather dirty-looking phial. "That is just a dollar."
sentences.cn: “那个嘛，”老人打开抽屉，拿出一瓶小小的，脏脏的瓶子，“只要一美元。”

sentences.en: Bohr Locked away with an imaginary phial of cyanide.
sentences.cn: 波尔它和一小瓶氯化物被封闭在密室中.

sentences.en: I've had people keep some of the ashes in a phial on a key-chain so they can keep their pet close to them.
sentences.cn: 我的做法是把一点儿宠物的骨灰封在小玻璃瓶里并挂在钥匙链上，这样主人会感到宠物永远和他们在一起。

sentences.en: The abb é made him smell the contents of the phial , and he again opened his eyes.
sentences.cn: 神甫使他嗅小瓶里的药水, 于是他又张开眼睛.

sentences.en: The killer seems more comfortable with a phial than with a dagger
sentences.cn: 相比匕首，凶手似乎更喜欢使用小药瓶。

trans.tran_en: a small bottle, especially for liquid medicines
